## Voice.getDeviceToken() method

Get the Device token from the native layer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDeviceToken(): Promise<string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

a Promise that resolves with a string representing the Device token.
